SEARCH
Package helpers

Class DataManager

java.lang.Object
helpers.DataManager
public class DataManager extends Object
Manages application-wide data including reading and writing of users, projects, and inquiries from/to CSV files. Also handles runtime data setup and cleanup on application exit.
